name: Unstable (Ludum Dare 49) (wally)
description:
This is my submission for Ludum Dare 49.

Feed and pet the creature to keep it calm until bedtime. If your efforts don't work, the creature will become upset and hyperactive. You have to fight it to calm it down. If you don't calm it down fast enough, it will run off and become too restless to sleep.

NOTE: Linux is untested, I don't have a Linux machine. Let me know if there are any issues.
